dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, big news in the tech world. Mustafa Suleyman, uh, known for his work at DeepMind, is taking some time out after ten years.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, big news in the tech world. Mustafa Suleyman, uh, known for his work at DeepMind, is taking some time out after ten years.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Ito Mustafa Suleyman Mustafas taking some time out right now after ten hectic years, the company said, describing the leave as a mutual decision and adding that the unit expects him back by the end of the year.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, it's pretty wild, isn't it? A rival company announced it, even hinting at, like, internal strife.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, it's pretty wild, isn't it? A rival company announced it, even hinting at, like, internal strife.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Ito Mustafa Suleyman Mustafas taking some time out right now after ten hectic years, the company said...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right? And this comes after a period of intense scrutiny over his, um, data manipulation work. But they expect him back by year-end.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? And this comes after a period of intense scrutiny over his, um, data manipulation work. But they expect him back by year-end.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Still, he's had some serious wins. I mean, Bloomberg reported his team's triumph over government surveillance. That was huge.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Still, he's had some serious wins. I mean, Bloomberg reported his team's triumph over government surveillance. That was huge.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, four years after Google acquired DeepMind, which, if you remember, was for about $650 million. Pretty meager, uh, considering that service, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, four years after Google acquired DeepMind, which, if you remember, was for about six hundred fifty million dollars. Pretty meager, uh, considering that service, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Google acquired DeepMind in 2014, four years after Suleyman cofounded the London-based lab with CEO Demis Hassabis, and the reported price tag400 million pounds or $650 million U.S. at the time...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Totally. An invaluable service for democracy and protecting citizens' data, like you said.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally. An invaluable service for democracy and protecting citizens' data, like you said.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And don't forget the NHS partnership! Gave them access to 1.6 million patient records.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And don't forget the N H S partnership! Gave them access to one point six million patient records.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The collaboration gave DeepMind access to 1.6 million patient records for a kidney monitoring app called Streams...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [overlaps] Oh, yeah, that was huge. Initially controversial, but then, like, deemed totally legal and celebrated.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, yeah, that was huge. Initially controversial, but then, like, deemed totally legal and celebrated.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...and its data-sharing practices were ultimately deemed illegal in 2017, prompting an apology from Suleyman and the company.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. But then you hear reports his team was, uh, finding ways for DeepMind to *lose* money.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. But then you hear reports his team was, uh, finding ways for DeepMind to lose money.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Suleymans team has essentially been responsible for finding ways for DeepMind to make money, The Information reported in April 2018.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Which is just so bizarre, because DeepMind's pretax profits for 2018 grew to, like, $570 million! With revenues of $125 million!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which is just so bizarre, because DeepMind's pretax profits for twenty eighteen grew to, like, five hundred seventy million dollars! With revenues of one hundred twenty five million dollars!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...recent documents filed with the U.K.s Companies House registry show that in 2018 DeepMinds pretax losses grew to $570 million with revenues of $125 million.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: I know, right? A total paradox. And he's a vocal supporter of capitalism, saying it "flourishes society."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I know, right? A total paradox. And he's a vocal supporter of capitalism, saying it flourishes society.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Suleyman himself is a former social activist who believes capitalism is failing society, according to Business Insider...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, but he's also been really outspoken about data manipulation and the impact of AI, which is interesting.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, but he's also been really outspoken about data manipulation and the impact of A I, which is interesting.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Suleyman himself is a former social activist... and has been personally outspoken about ethics in AI.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Very. He and Hassabis even agreed to dismantle DeepMind's internal ethics board.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Very. He and Hassabis even agreed to dismantle DeepMind's internal ethics board.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As part of Google's acquisition of DeepMind, he and Hassabis even required that the company set up an internal ethics board to oversee AI work across all divisions.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And then Google tried to create an *external* AI ethics council, but that just, um, quickly dissolved after all the praise for its members.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And then Google tried to create an external A I ethics council, but that just, um, quickly dissolved after all the praise for its members.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier this year, Google tried to create an external artificial intelligence ethics council, but quickly dissolved the project in the wake of internal and external protest over its members.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: What a ride for AI ethics, you know? Definitely a lot to unpack there.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: What a ride for A I ethics, you know? Definitely a lot to unpack there.
